There were no other sightings in York on or around December 23rd 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend woke me and said; you gotta come see this. I went to the door, looked up and saw an odject comming towards us at a fairly high rate of speed. That's when I asked her to grab the camera. The picture shows a vapor trail which is kind of squiggly, but the object was traveling straight. It stopped in mid air for approxamatly 10-15 seconds then traveled to the left(which is in the photo)and disappeared right after the photo was taken within a second or two.
Summary: Straight towards me in the sky. Stopped in mid air then took off 90 degrees in other direction.
